title: New neta no support bot
body: When I play adc I'd rather have a solo lane. I just farm til 6 then usually get double kill since I'm ahead in xP. Solo adc works beautifully. Let support go top instead. Since top is ganked waaaay more then boy. Even without the wards from my support, Im at tower anyways and I'm playing safe.  New meta. Try it

replies.body: I don't think solo bot is going to work too well against a Leona/Caitlyn lane.

> [{quoted}](name=Kazaashi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Qa66WyfO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-06T21:19:36.477+0000)
>
> I don't think solo bot is going to work too well against a Leona/Caitlyn lane.

I've done it with lucian. It was leona vayne.
That leaves dragon open. Duo mid maybe, but not duo top.

> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Qa66WyfO,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-06T21:22:04.918+0000)
>
> That leaves dragon open. Duo mid maybe, but not duo top.

Jungler is in charge of drag control anyways imo.
Yes, but when contesting for dragon, you need as many as you can get. Having more people near dragon is important.

you must be facing really horrible opponents if you can get a double kill all by yourself and ADCs are one of the easiest champions in the game to turret dive so you being under your turret isn't going to save you if the enemy actually wants to kill you

> [{quoted}](name=ZephyrDrake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Qa66WyfO,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-05-06T22:34:35.684+0000)
>
> you must be facing really horrible opponents if you can get a double kill all by yourself and ADCs are one of the easiest champions in the game to turret dive so you being under your turret isn't going to save you if the enemy actually wants to kill you

I won't say I'm good, cus I suck... But at my elo I always seem to be able to get away with 1v2 bot lanes. I just farm under tower and poke them while they attack my tower. They can't tower dive as easy as you think. How many times have you had a leona support dive their adc after their support backed, and it results in the enemy adc getting a free kill.... Lots.
If they're good they can just zone you out of cs and not push the lane and you can't get any cs.

> [{quoted}](name=Miku Lv99,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Qa66WyfO,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-06T21:42:11.368+0000)
>
> If they're good they can just zone you out of cs and not push the lane and you can't get any cs.

I should've been more clear... My champs are ez and lucian.

With the right champ maybe.  There asre some who NEED a support (like my squishy lol Kog maw)  And other situations where their support gives such poke and harass yoou cant even farm at tower.   

In select matchups it could work great, but in the majority of all others you would suffer greatly
You must be one of those that insult, blame or harass your supp everytime they die or not ward.

> [{quoted}](name=551202,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Qa66WyfO,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-05-06T23:47:29.706+0000)
>
> You must one of those that insult and blame/harass your supp everytime they die or not ward or heal

How do you come to that conclusion with what he said? Because he emphasized need?
top getting ganked more then bot? what game are you in?

> [{quoted}](name=insaiyanbacca,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Qa66WyfO,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-05-06T23:26:34.157+0000)
>
> top getting ganked more then bot? what game are you in?

As a season 4 jungle main, and common sense, bot is always warded ( sightstone) it's really hard to gank bot. I'd rather spend my time ganking top or mid. And in my games I see the same happen. The only times I see bot ganks are from enemy mid laners coming down, or mid and jungle...
I'd love to have you as an enemy when I'm rolling Nautilus Support.

> [{quoted}](name=Postal Badger,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Qa66WyfO,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-05-06T21:44:39.159+0000)
>
> I'd love to have you as an enemy when I'm rolling Nautilus Support.

Okay. I'd hit 6 way before you. Last time I tried this I hit 6 and the enemy allistar and twitch were still level 4. Naut, without level 6, at most can flash stun. Then I can ignore you while I burst your adc cus he doesn't have ult and I do.

Supports go bot because there's not enough room on the map so somebody has to duo lane, and ADCs scale more with items than levels so losing out on XP for them isn't as huge, and there's dragon control.

Even at 6 an ADC can't 2v1 another adc and a support because he'll just get CC'd and blown up. A solo lane 2v1 ADC would be especially easy to dive as well.

> [{quoted}](name=SgtCrispy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Qa66WyfO,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-05-06T22:15:34.328+0000)
>
> Supports go bot because there's not enough room on the map so somebody has to duo lane, and ADCs scale more with items than levels so losing out on XP for them isn't as huge, and there's dragon control.
> 
> Even at 6 an ADC can't 2v1 another adc and a support because he'll just get CC'd and blown up. A solo lane 2v1 ADC would be especially easy to dive as well.

try solo bot lucian. Wath what happens when they try to dive you early
And then the enemy top laner gets a double kill at 6 because exp advantage

> [{quoted}](name=Xuldin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Qa66WyfO,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-05-06T22:14:03.112+0000)
>
> And then the enemy top laner gets a double kill at 6 because exp advantage

Lies
TFW you're laning vs an alistar.
The spelling errors. Is he a mad man or the next presidential candidate?
